text: They quit serving coffee so I had to choose a soft drink, PEPSI. Today was the second time l ordered June 30, 2019 Pepsi and they were out. Mr/Ms Manager make some coffee or fix the Pepsi machine please.

name: Erica Lindsey
text: Friendly staff, didn't have to wait long for order pick up; but they don't wear gloves when making the food. I saw a lady make a pizza, grab a napkin to wipe her hand, touch the POS screen, and then went back to making the pizza without washing her hands.

name: Chelsea
text: We went inside to eat, and it was not even ok. I was not impressed by the staff at all. The girl got our order wrong the first time, then she forgot two of our drinks.  I believe that they have 12 tables (booths included), and when we got â€¦More
